summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department;, accepting easements for watermain purposes over, across and along portions of real property located in Cedar Park No. 3; City of Seattle Short Subdivision No. 83-284 and University Lake Shore Addition Divisions 1, 2 and 3; all in King County, Washington; and accepting an easement for a hydrant and appurtenances over, across and along a portion of the Southwest Quarter, of the Southeast Quarter of Section 6, Township 26, Range 4 East, W.M. in King County, Washington.
